title: Purity
verses: 2 Timothy 2:22 (WEB) — “Flee from youthful lusts; pursue righteousness.”
1 Thessalonians 4:3–4 (WEB) — “This is God’s will: your sanctification.”
Job 31:1 (WEB) — “I made a covenant with my eyes.”
1 Corinthians 6:19–20 (WEB) — “Your body is a temple… you were bought with a price.”
body: Purity grows when greater love fills the heart. Replace dark habits with light-filled rhythms—Scripture, prayer, accountability, and purposeful work.
prayer: Holy Spirit, purify my thoughts and desires. Strengthen me to flee temptation and to walk in the freedom of holiness. Amen.
